summary: A CODIS hit notification was issued by ABC Forensic Services Laboratory indicating a DNA match between a sample from case A2022-05555 and a convicted offender, Trevor Toler. The match serves as an investigative lead, and a known reference sample from Trevor Toler is required for further analysis. The document advises on obtaining the reference sample and offers consultation for familial samples if needed.
conclusion: A high stringency DNA match was found with Trevor Toler, requiring a reference sample for confirmation.

people.name: Trevor Toler
people.relevance: Convicted Offender with a DNA match

events.details: A high stringency match occurred between the DNA profile from Laboratory Case Number A2022-05555 and the convicted offender sample of Trevor Toler.

description: DNA profile matched to convicted offender Trevor Toler.
